text: The housewife would find life far less tiring if she made a list, followed a routine of work rather than getting from one find that he reached the end of the day with far less strain if he was a little more systematic. To drift aimlessly along is more wearying than anything else. If we would only sit down and write out all the necessary jobs waiting to be done and then work quietly through them, we would find life considerably less exhausting - and in the end we would do more..
